billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Provides for the disclosure of certain ownership information by funeral firms at their premises and in certain written materials
summary: Provides for the disclosure of ownership interest of ten percent or more by funeral firms at their premises and in certain written materials, including, letterhead, invoices, and advertising.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the display of ownership information by funeral firms
